rules_text:
Flash [i](You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)[/i]
When Pincher Crab leaves the battlefield, target creature you don’t control gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
notes:
New card — Replaced Harsh Critic

Somehow, black lost it’s second 1/2-drop in the shuffle of revisions, and the flash deck wants a good cheap flash creature. Given the critic cycle is being replaced/reworked, it’s the natural card to cut in order to open up room for this slot.
